LABEL: 0x34F
STRING: In the end, no one retorted that the library was where she was hiding in the first place.

LABEL: 0x3AF
STRING: We left the wheelhouse in near silence.

LABEL: 0x3ED
STRING: As Tokiwa said, it wasn't good for one's mental health to stay cooped up in one room all the time.

LABEL: 0x43D
STRING: So, we all went to the library together.

LABEL: 0x477
STRING: The library, or in other words, the reference room.

LABEL: 0x4A9
STRING: We unlocked the door, turned on the lights, and saw the shadows of many books floating on the walls.

LABEL: 0x4F9
STRING: Since we were at the bottom of the sea, where radio waves didn't reach,

LABEL: Split3
STRING: the library wasn't linked to the public library database, and the lineup was mainly of proprietary marine materials.

LABEL: 0x579
STRING: So it was no wonder that the bluish covers stood out so much.

LABEL: 0x5A9
STRING: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested in the library, but it wasn't the books we were here for.

LABEL: 0x5FF
STRING: A search monitor was placed right in front of the entrance.

LABEL: 0x637
STRING: Tokiwa sat herself down in front of it and turned on her calculator.

LABEL: 0x679
STRING: Yukari held out her ID card from her side and tapped something on the keyboard.

LABEL: 0x788
STRING: 「This is the design data for the diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x7C7
STRING: 「Well, well, well... Thank you.」

LABEL: 0x7F2
STRING: Tokiwa faced the monitor with a half-hearted reply.

LABEL: 0x828
STRING: There wasn't a hint of nervousness on her face.

LABEL: 0x854
STRING: She seemed to be at ease.

LABEL: 0x8F9
STRING: 「Well then, I'll begin.」

LABEL: 0x928
STRING: 「Please do.」

LABEL: 0x983
STRING: With that, Tokiwa's hands began to move...

LABEL: 0xA36
STRING: 「Hnn‾」

LABEL: 0xABC
STRING: 「Hnnnnnnn‾...」

LABEL: 0xBD2
STRING: 「Hnnnnnnnnnn‾‾‾‾」

LABEL: 0xC14
STRING: ...What the hell kind of noise was that?

LABEL: 0xC3A
STRING: Tokiwa continued tapping on the keyboard, sounding like she was fooling around.

LABEL: 0xC7C
STRING: I was surprised she wasn't out of breath yet.

LABEL: 0xC9E
STRING: On the other hand, her fingers never stopped tapping the keys... She didn't seem to be having any trouble at all.

LABEL: 0xCF2
STRING: As someone who wrote a lot of code, I couldn't help but admire her touch.

LABEL: 0xD7B
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0xDA2
STRING: 「Hnnnnnnn――――......

LABEL: 0xE30
STRING: Phew.」

LABEL: 0xEB0
STRING: 「Is this keyboard broken?」

LABEL: 0xEE5
STRING: I turned to look at the text on the screen.

LABEL: 0xF29
STRING: 【abbmrbacyrbrtfrtgpcygyroc[[oa[[l.byrbryfrtt.c,rd.bbogg.】

LABEL: 0xF77
STRING: ...What the hell was this?

LABEL: 0xF93
STRING: 「Can I borrow that?」

LABEL: 0xFB9
STRING: I took the keyboard from her and tried typing.

LABEL: 0xFED
STRING: ...This works just fine?

LABEL: 0x100F
STRING: Is this girl okay? Wasn't she supposed to be a genius?

LABEL: 0x1112
STRING: 「I'm afraid I'm going to have to use paper.」

LABEL: 0x114D
STRING: 「Won't that take a long time...? Are you sure?」

LABEL: 0x11F5
STRING: 「It's A-OK!」

LABEL: 0x124E
STRING: Tokiwa fished out a piece of paper and a pen from the back of the library and began writing.

LABEL: 0x129C
STRING: I looked over her shoulder at the paper, which was filled with incredibly detailed numbers.

LABEL: 0x12FC
STRING: ...Was she calculating this by hand?

LABEL: 0x131E
STRING: Just how long was this going to ta――

LABEL: 0x13CB
STRING: 「I'm done.」

LABEL: 0x13F4
STRING: That was fast.

LABEL: 0x1416
STRING: 「Huh? Are you sure?」

LABEL: 0x1437
STRING: I wasn't exaggerating. It didn't even take half the time I thought it would.

LABEL: 0x147F
STRING: It surprised not only me but Yukari and Hiragino as well.

LABEL: 0x1599
STRING: 「That was fast...」

LABEL: 0x15C4
STRING: 「So, what's the result?」

LABEL: 0x15F3
STRING: Tokiwa responded to Yukari's question with a peace sign.

LABEL: 0x1709
STRING: 「In theory, it can withstand a temperature of 1000 degrees for up to 10 seconds.」

LABEL: 0x1752
STRING: 「Really? So, what about the water depth?」

LABEL: 0x17F7
STRING: 「And as you'd expect, at minus 500 degrees, you won't be able to move.」

LABEL: 0x18AD
STRING: 「And the depth?」

LABEL: 0x1946
STRING: 「Dropping it from high up would generate more kinetic energy than average.」

LABEL: 0x1A0D
STRING: 「The depth...?」

LABEL: 0x1AA2
STRING: 「And due to the special material it's made out of, it seems to be perfectly comfortable to wear!」

LABEL: 0x1BB0
STRING: 「Depth!!!」

LABEL: 0x1C4C
STRING: 「It appears to be suitable for up to 800 meters.」

LABEL: 0x1CBD
STRING: 800 meters...

LABEL: 0x1CD3
STRING: So it was perfectly usable here.

LABEL: 0x1DCE
STRING: 「Okay, if that's the case...」

LABEL: 0x1E75
STRING: 「Is this really alright?」

LABEL: 0x1EA6
STRING: Yukari yet persisted.

LABEL: 0x1F63
STRING: 「No problem. I calculated it in my head, but the numbers came together well in the end.」

LABEL: 0x1FA2
STRING: ...Was this going to be okay?

LABEL: 0x1FD2
STRING: But the only thing we could trust now was her and her ability to calculate.

LABEL: 0x2012
STRING: If we doubted her, we had nothing left.

LABEL: 0x20D8
STRING: 「You're being insistent, Momoi.」

LABEL: 0x20F8
STRING: 「If she's right, then let's go and get a diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x212C
STRING: 「They were in the warehouse on the first floor, right?」

LABEL: 0x215F
STRING: 「...Right.」

LABEL: 0x218C
STRING: 「In that case, лл-kun and Momoi, follow me.」

LABEL: 0x21F6
STRING: With Yukari still unconvinced, we made our way toward the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x2500
STRING: We opened the warehouse door with Yukari's keycard.

LABEL: 0x252C
STRING: Compared to the passenger cabins it was much more spacious, but not as much attention had been paid to the interior.

LABEL: 0x2607
STRING: 「Let's split up and search.」

LABEL: 0x2657
STRING: Following Hiragino's advice, we started searching the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x2697
STRING: The warehouse was tidy, as you'd expect from a newly built ship.

LABEL: 0x26E9
STRING: However, a warehouse was still a warehouse, with various equipment laid out in an unorganized fashion.

LABEL: 0x2741
STRING: I made my way through mysterious equipment and wads of paper and...

LABEL: 0x2775
STRING: 「H-Here it is!」

LABEL: 0x2797
STRING: A diving suit... Although it looked more like a space suit.

LABEL: 0x27DF
STRING: There were two of them next to each other.

LABEL: 0x2814
STRING: I mean, they kind of stood out.

LABEL: 0x283E
STRING: We didn't really need to even look for them.

LABEL: 0x2862
STRING: Hearing my voice, Hiragino and Yukari came to me.

LABEL: 0x2917
STRING: 「All right, let's carry them. You take that one.」

LABEL: 0x2948
STRING: 「Got it... Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x299D
STRING: I lifted the suit with my arms, or rather, tried to.

LABEL: 0x29F3
STRING: It didn't move.

LABEL: 0x2A11
STRING: What's this? It's so heavy.

LABEL: 0x2A3D
STRING: It was as if it had been sewn to the floor and wouldn't budge.

LABEL: 0x2A7F
STRING: I gave up on the suit and reached for the oxygen tank lying on its side.

LABEL: 0x2ABB
STRING: 「――Hrnnggg!」

LABEL: 0x2AD7
STRING: That was some voice I let out.

LABEL: 0x2AFF
STRING: While leaning back, I managed to lift the tank.

LABEL: 0x2B39
STRING: ...I lifted it, but...

LABEL: 0x2B5B
STRING: This alone weighed only about 20 kilograms.

LABEL: 0x2B8B
STRING: ...It wasn't heavy enough to be carried by itself.

LABEL: 0x2C60
STRING: 「We could carry the suit with the two of us...」

LABEL: 0x2CCE
STRING: Ultimately, it took two people to carry a single diving suit.

LABEL: 0x2D10
STRING: 「...So, where do we take it?」

LABEL: 0x2DC3
STRING: 「The hatch to get out of the ship is in the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x2DFC
STRING: The emergency room... So on the third floor.

LABEL: 0x2E43
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x2E5B
STRING: I lifted the tank and helmet and managed to carry them in a slouched stance.

LABEL: 0x2EBB
STRING: Slowly, while trying not to lose my balance, and as swiftly as possible... Just getting out of the warehouse was a challenge.

LABEL: 0x2F23
STRING: The other person carrying the rest of the diving suit, Hiragino, was――

LABEL: 0x2FD4
STRING: 「Well, good luck. I'll head there first.」

LABEL: 0x3036
STRING: After saying that, he went off on his own, carrying almost twice the weight I was.

LABEL: 0x308C
STRING: What was with that strength?

LABEL: 0x3116
STRING: I then noticed Yukari, who was left alone in the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x314C
STRING: She was brought here by Hiragino but had yet to speak a word since we unlocked the door.

LABEL: 0x31B4
STRING: 「Momoi-san...?」

LABEL: 0x3206
STRING: She muttered something as I called out to her.

LABEL: 0x328E
STRING: 「...Why do you all want to kill him so badly?」

LABEL: 0x32E3
STRING: She walked out in a daze.

LABEL: 0x3307
STRING: Hiragino was carrying the heavy diving suit on his back.

LABEL: 0x3335
STRING: Now that he was about to wear it himself and go out into the sea, what was he thinking about, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x3399
STRING: I followed them to the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x3731
STRING: As we brought in the diving suit, Tokiwa looked at it curiously.

LABEL: 0x37A0
STRING: We had asked her to take care of Touri, but...

LABEL: 0x37D8
STRING: Looking closely, you could see that their hands were now affectionately joined together.

LABEL: 0x381A
STRING: They looked like good friends... Or so I would've liked to say.

LABEL: 0x386C
STRING: The contrast between Tokiwa, who reacted to the diving suit with great excitement, and Touri, whose expression was bleak and unresponsive, was striking.

LABEL: 0x3965
STRING: 「Well then...」

LABEL: 0x398A
STRING: Hiragino reached for the diving suit that we both had carried here.

LABEL: 0x39BC
STRING: He intended to put it on as soon as possible and go outside the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x3A03
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0x3A43
STRING: 「Wait, please.」

LABEL: 0x3A61
STRING: I interrupted him.

LABEL: 0x3AE7
STRING: Hiragino looked at me in suspicion.

LABEL: 0x3B1E
STRING: 「What is it? Are you telling me to stop now, too, because it's dangerous?」

LABEL: 0x3B63
STRING: 「That's not it.」

LABEL: 0x3B8C
STRING: 「So, then――」

LABEL: 0x3BAF
STRING: 「I'll go to the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x3C54
STRING: 「Wha――」

LABEL: 0x3D17
STRING: The two of them looked at me in surprise.

LABEL: 0x3D43
STRING: Their reaction was as I expected.

LABEL: 0x3D61
STRING: It was quite refreshing... However, I didn't say that just to surprise them.

LABEL: 0x3DEE
STRING: I wasn't joking.

LABEL: 0x3E0A
STRING: It wasn't that I was desperate.

LABEL: 0x3E36
STRING: I glanced at the expressionless Touri and made up my mind again.

LABEL: 0x3E7A
STRING: This was a decision I had made after much deliberation.

LABEL: 0x3F2B
STRING: 「Do you even know what you're saying?!」

LABEL: 0x3F74
STRING: Hiragino raised his voice.

LABEL: 0x3F98
STRING: But I wasn't going to back down.

LABEL: 0x3FB6
STRING: I could still make it sound like a joke if I pulled back now.

LABEL: 0x4002
STRING: But I wouldn't let that happen.

LABEL: 0x4020
STRING: Hiragino repeated his words to me as I stood upright before him.

LABEL: 0x405F
STRING: 「There's no guarantee you'll make it out alive!」

LABEL: 0x4085
STRING: 「This isn't something I can leave to a passenger!」

LABEL: 0x40C8
STRING: 「And that's why you shouldn't go, Hiragino-san.」

LABEL: 0x4100
STRING: 「The only person who can help us if something happens is the ship's doctor.」

LABEL: 0x4157
STRING: 「Wasn't it you who helped us in the wheelhouse?!」

LABEL: 0x419C
STRING: 「Exactly... My part in this is already over.」

LABEL: 0x41D6
STRING: Hiragino was astonished.

LABEL: 0x41F4
STRING: I had already done all I could with the knowledge I had.

LABEL: 0x4228
STRING: Yes, all I could.

LABEL: 0x4244
STRING: 「I've done all I can.」

LABEL: 0x4272
STRING: 「...Isn't that right, Momoi-san?」

LABEL: 0x431B
STRING: I directed my question at Yukari, who was silently in thought beside Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x4359
STRING: She seemed somewhat hesitant.

LABEL: 0x43FE
STRING: 「...What лл-san is saying is correct.」

LABEL: 0x44B6
STRING: 「Momoi!」

LABEL: 0x44DD
STRING: 「As the ship's doctor, Hiragino-sensei has a duty to protect these girls.」

LABEL: 0x4523
STRING: 「Even if there are more survivors, we can't take proper care of them without him.」

LABEL: 0x4609
STRING: Yukari's words were reasonable enough to convince Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x467A
STRING: He tried to say something but couldn't. He glared at me and turned away.

LABEL: 0x46D0
STRING: ...If Tokiwa's calculations were correct, the diving suit itself was safe.

LABEL: 0x471C
STRING: I could see why Hiragino would be worried, but it wasn't like it didn't matter who went out there.

LABEL: 0x47DE
STRING: Yukari, who had persuaded Hiragino, was now standing before me.

LABEL: 0x4826
STRING: 「W-What is it?」

LABEL: 0x4857
STRING: 「...Can you tell me your reason?」

LABEL: 0x488C
STRING: 「My reason―」

LABEL: 0x48C1
STRING: 「What you just said is the reason why we shouldn't let Hiragino-sensei go.」

LABEL: 0x4905
STRING: 「I still haven't heard why we should let you do it instead.」

LABEL: 0x494C
STRING: ――She was sharp.

LABEL: 0x4964
STRING: Yukari's point was absolutely true.

LABEL: 0x498C
STRING: If Hiragino couldn't do it, it was a bit short-sighted to say I was the next choice.

LABEL: 0x49C8
STRING: The fact that I was a man could be a reason, but Yukari should also be considered in terms of hierarchy.

LABEL: 0x4A59
STRING: Nevertheless... I had to go.

LABEL: 0x4A89
STRING: There was a reason.

LABEL: 0x4AA3
STRING: But they wouldn't let me go if I explained it to them.

LABEL: 0x4AEF
STRING: On the contrary, things were bound to get even worse.

LABEL: 0x4B29
STRING: So――

LABEL: 0x4BFF
STRING: 「I'm sorry... but I can't tell you yet.」

LABEL: 0x4C2D
STRING: I bowed my head deeply.

LABEL: 0x4C53
STRING: 「But I promise to tell you when I get back.」

LABEL: 0x4C89
STRING: 「I have to go, no matter what.」

LABEL: 0x4CC3
STRING: That was my responsibility.

LABEL: 0x4CE1
STRING: I had to do something.

LABEL: 0x4D13
STRING: I had to save everyone... without sacrificing anyone else.

LABEL: 0x4E6D
STRING: 「I understand. I believe you.」

LABEL: 0x4E9A
STRING: When I raised my head, Yukari was staring straight at me with a serious expression.

LABEL: 0x4EDE
STRING: I straightened my posture to respond to her.

LABEL: 0x4F1D
STRING: 「Let's go over the details.」

LABEL: 0x4F54
STRING: With that, I followed Yukari to a corner of the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x4FA7
STRING: 「Regarding how to get outside...」

LABEL: 0x4FCF
STRING: 「Naturally, the water pressure outside cannot be compared to the air pressure inside this room.」

LABEL: 0x501B
STRING: 「In order to open the hatch to the outside, the internal and external pressures need to be equalized.」

LABEL: 0x506D
STRING: 「First, we'll have you enter the pressurization room.」

LABEL: 0x50A2
STRING: One corner of the emergency room was jutting out inward.

LABEL: 0x50E0
STRING: The hatch that led outside was inside there.

LABEL: 0x513D
STRING: Yukari held out her keycard and opened the door.

LABEL: 0x516D
STRING: There were steps inside and another thick metal door at the top of the ascent.

LABEL: 0x51C3
STRING: Pressing a button on the side of the room, the door slid open, finally revealing the interior.

LABEL: 0x5215
STRING: 「So this is the pressurization room...」

LABEL: 0x5239
STRING: That's what it was called, but it was so cramped it didn't feel like a room at all.

LABEL: 0x5281
STRING: It was a small space, barely big enough for two people.

LABEL: 0x52B5
STRING: It was ruggedly built, clearly different from the other facilities, which were designed solely with sightseeing in mind.

LABEL: 0x5319
STRING: This made it seem more like a submarine.

LABEL: 0x5349
STRING: The space was even smaller than I had imagined from the outside.

LABEL: 0x5385
STRING: I wondered how thick the inner walls were... That's a lot of pressure they were withstanding.

LABEL: 0x5450
STRING: 「At the back of the room is a hatch leading to the outside.」

LABEL: 0x548C
STRING: 「Lock the door, raise the lever there, and the pressurization room will fill with water.」

LABEL: 0x54DA
STRING: 「Pressurization is then applied to increase the water pressure in the room to match the water pressure outside.」

LABEL: 0x5536
STRING: 「In approximately five minutes, the hatch to the outside can be opened.」

LABEL: 0x556E
STRING: 「Got it.」

LABEL: 0x55B5
STRING: After that, I put on the diving suit with Hiragino's help.

LABEL: 0x55F9
STRING: It was heavy, as expected.

LABEL: 0x5615
STRING: The weight of it on my shoulders made my skin feel soft and damp even as I was standing still.

LABEL: 0x565D
STRING: On the other hand, it was surprisingly easy to breathe inside.

LABEL: 0x56AB
STRING: However, that wouldn't ease the discomfort caused by its weight...

LABEL: 0x56FD
STRING: After all, it was hard enough just to lift my feet and walk.

LABEL: 0x5733
STRING: Combined with the narrow field of view, it was difficult to move forward.

LABEL: 0x57E0
STRING: 「...You okay in there?」

LABEL: 0x580B
STRING: 「Yeah, of course.」

LABEL: 0x582F
STRING: Even though I answered that way, I wasn't sure if they heard me properly.

LABEL: 0x589E
STRING: It took its time, but I entered the pressurization room with the help of Hiragino and Yukari and turned around.

LABEL: 0x5977
STRING: 「Be careful.」

LABEL: 0x5A23
STRING: 「If you think you're in any danger, come back immediately.」

LABEL: 0x5AE6
STRING: 「Godspeed.」

LABEL: 0x5B05
STRING: I received words of encouragement from each of the three.

LABEL: 0x5B56
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x5BDA
STRING: Touri was silent.

LABEL: 0x5BF4
STRING: Our eyes met.

LABEL: 0x5C0C
STRING: Her eyes were vacant.

LABEL: 0x5C52
STRING: I would fulfill... my responsibility.

LABEL: 0x5D0D
STRING: The metal door closed.

LABEL: 0x5D31
STRING: In the dimly lit room, I could hardly see anything.

LABEL: 0x5D65
STRING: First of all... yes, the lever.

LABEL: 0x5D8B
STRING: I groped around for the lever in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x5DBB
STRING: I soon felt a weighty sensation.

LABEL: 0x5DE7
STRING: It was retro... but somehow reassuring.

LABEL: 0x5E1D
STRING: Eventually, an electronic sound rang out.

LABEL: 0x5E43
STRING: Water started flowing in.

LABEL: 0x5E6B
STRING: The water was slowly flooding in from under my feet...

LABEL: 0x5E9F
STRING: The fact that I didn't feel any wetness at all made me feel uncomfortable.

LABEL: 0x5EE3
STRING: However, the surface of the water was visibly rising.

LABEL: 0x5F17
STRING: Slowly and steadily.

LABEL: 0x5F53
STRING: Five minutes later.

LABEL: 0x5F68
STRING: The room, now completely filled with seawater, shook.

LABEL: 0x5FA0
STRING: The hatch opened.

LABEL: 0x5FBC
STRING: In front of me was darkness.

LABEL: 0x5FDA
STRING: I took a deep breath and opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x6006
STRING: And then――

LABEL: 0x601C
STRING: I walked out into the darkness.
